description: This header defines the BadgerThunderPlugin class, a JSON-RPC plugin component for WPEFramework that exposes Badger permission APIs. It includes method declarations for plugin lifecycle management and specific JSON-RPC endpoints related to permissions and capability listing.

classes.name: BadgerThunderPlugin
classes.description: A plugin class for WPEFramework providing JSON-RPC methods to interact with Badger permissions, serving as an interface layer with no embedded logic.

methods.name: BadgerThunderPlugin
methods.description: Constructor that sets up JSON-RPC methods.

methods.name: ~BadgerThunderPlugin
methods.description: Destructor that cleans up and unregisters JSON-RPC methods.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin, called during activation.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin, called during deactivation.

methods.name: endpoint_ping
methods.description: Responds with 'pong' to a ping command.

methods.name: endpoint_permissions_listMethods
methods.description: Returns a list of permission-related method names.

methods.name: endpoint_permissions_check
methods.description: Stub for permission check, always returns allowed.

methods.name: endpoint_permissions_checkAll
methods.description: Stub for bulk permission check, returns static response.

methods.name: endpoint_permissions_listFireboltPermissions
methods.description: Returns a list of Firebolt permission IDs.
